item.title: A Pair of Beomaster 1900 Receivers for Restoration: Capacitor Replacement on Unit #2
item.description:
The first Beomaster 1900 receiver is fully operational and undergoing testing in a listening room. However, the second unit still requires restoration. Initial assessment of the second Beomaster 1900 has already been completed, and now it’s time to begin replacing capacitors on the main circuit board. The main circuit board houses most of the capacitors that need replacing. Unfortunately, it cannot be removed for servicing and must remain connected to the wire harness...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/a-pair-of-beomaster-1900-receivers-for-restoration-capacitor-replacement-on-unit-2/
